code: import axios from"axios";import{appConstants}from"../constants/constant";export var postReviews=function postReviews(review,success,failure){var postReviews=axios.post("".concat(appConstants.API,"/reviews"),review).then(function(res){res.data.success?typeof success==='function'&&success():typeof failure==='function'&&failure();return res;}).catch(function(err){typeof failure==='function'&&failure(err);return err;});console.log(postReviews);return{type:appConstants.POST_REVIEW,payload:postReviews};};export var getReviews=function getReviews(){var getReviewsPromise=axios.get("".concat(appConstants.API,"/reviews"));return{type:appConstants.GET_REVIEW,payload:getReviewsPromise};};
